common.name: Mohamed Rizk
common.about_us_1: In a short time, our office has occupied a remarkable place among professional firms in Egypt and Dubai. This is because our firm has dedicated business professionals who possess and maintain standards of integrity and technical skills while caring for our clients.
common.about_us_2: M1 Group, for accounting, audit, Tax and Consultancy was established more than 16 years ago by a team of professionals with diverse experiences in the fields of auditing, tax services, regulation, administrative restructuring.
common.about_us_3: M1 Group audit, tax and consultancy facility relies on professional standards and quality levels through the facility’s partners and employees who have the appropriate academic qualifications.
common.about_us_4: As well as relying on the administrative and professional leaders in the governmental fields, where the facility works as ministerial agents in the former Central Auditing Organization and the former Director General of the Tax Authority, as well as advisers in the State Council previously, as well as those who have experience in the former Capital Market Authority.
common.mission_desc: Mohamed Rezk & Co.  chartered accountants, consultants, and tax advisers – consistently strive to adhere to the highest professional standards, and provide sound advice to our clients while preserving our independence. We are open and honest in our communication and exchange of information in providing services and advice frequently and constructively with the management of difficult situations.
common.vision_desc: We hope to obtain accounting solutions for small and large companies in addition to being licensed tax and providing our customers with peace of mind knowing that their financial money is taken care of without breaking the bank every month.
common.objective_desc:
Provide exceptional financial and professional services while maintaining the highest levels of integrity and professionalism.
Continue to provide an independent range of financial services, with a specific focus on our core market clients and their business interests.
Build a strong, deep and long lasting relationship with our clients to deliver the very best for them. With a distinctive partnership culture, we work together to achieve your goals.
Manage business risk to ensure that the interests of our clients continue to be at the forefront of everything we do.
Be respected for the quality of our client service.
common.our_clients: Our Accountants Have Experience On These Platforms
common.copy_writes_end: All Rights Reserved by M1 Group
common.our_services_sub: We provide a comprehensive range of professional accounting services. Our breadth of services provides you with a one stop for your accounting, taxation, and financial needs.
common.say_something: Say something to start your Service
common.subject: Subject
common.contact_us_sub: Any question or remarks? Just write us a message!
common.faq_sub: Have any questions? We're here to assist you.
common.ourServiceDesc: At M1 group, we are committed to your business's success and growth.
common.ques_1: Will i have to see or speak to the internal revenue service if you take my case ?
common.ques_2: Is registration on the new system compulsory or optional for financiers?
common.answer_1: No, i will handle your case in its entirety and all the communication will be made directly through myself as an enrolled agent .
common.answer_2: Registration on the new system is compulsory for all financiers and registrants according to the schedule in force, both according to the phases allocated to the project. The first phase was applied to the financiers of the Center for Senior Financiers, the Center for Medium Financiers, and the Center for Senior Free Professions.
common.answer_3: Our fees for an Offer in Compromise are reasonably based on a flat rate and the terms of our engagement will be presented to you during your free initial consultation
common.address_eg: Egypt: 94 Abdelaziz fahmy st. Saint - fatima square, masr gadeda.
common.address_du: Dubai : Nada building, apartment no. 502, Al Barsha first street, Al Barsha1, Dubai.
common.client_sub_word: At M1 Group, we are committed to your business's success and growth.
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_TEXT_1: When you register or submit personal information to M1 GROUP we will use this information in the manner outlined in this Privacy Statement. Your personal information is not used for other purposes, unless we obtain your permission, or unless otherwise required or permitted by law or professional standards.
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_TEXT_2: M1GROUP generally collects only the personal information necessary to fulfill your request. We can process personal information, so long as we have a ground under the law to do so.  As a result, when we process your personal information, we will rely on one of the following processing conditions:
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_UL_1: Performance of a contract: this is when the processing of your personal information is necessary in order to perform our obligations under a contract;
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_UL_2: Legal obligation: this is when we are required to process your personal information in order to comply with a legal obligation, such as keeping records for tax purposes or providing information to a public body or law enforcement agency;
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_UL_3: Legitimate interests: we will process information about you where it is in our legitimate interest in running a lawful business to do so in order to further that business.
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_UL_4: Your consent: in some cases, we will ask you for specific permission to process some of your personal information, and we will only process your personal information in this way if you agree to us doing so.
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_EXAMPLES: Examples of the ‘legitimate interests’ referred to above are:
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_EXAMPLES_UL_1: To prevent fraud or criminal activity and to safeguard our IT systems.
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_EXAMPLES_UL_2: To conduct, and to analyze, our marketing activities.
common.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_EXAMPLES_UL_3: To meet our corporate and social responsibility obligations.
common.POLICY_TEXT_1: The information on this website which is accessed by M1 Group is provided for general guidance and is intended to provide general information of interest to the user. The information provided is not intended to replace or be a substitute for any review, advisory, tax or other professional service. You must consult an M1Group professional in accounting, auditing, consulting, taxation, or any other professional field to obtain these services. Use of the Content is personal and non-commercial.
common.POLICY_TEXT_2: Policies are subject to the laws of Egypt and Dubai. Application of laws and regulations may vary depending on specific facts or circumstances.
common.POLICY_TEXT_3: Due to the nature of electronic communications, M1Group does not guarantee that the Website will be error free. Therefore, the information is provided without any warranties of any kind. In no event will M1Group or any of its employees be liable for any direct, indirect or other damages. Some links are provided as a convenience to our users, M1Group has no control over, and is not responsible for, any of these links or their content.
common.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_TEXT_1: All content on the Site: Including any concepts, ideas, methods, procedures, processes, knowledge, technologies, software, publications, models, templates, products, technologies, software, designs, artwork, graphics, and information on or described on the Site may be protected by copyright, proprietary and subject to intellectual property or other rights, and any use of Any material on the Site may infringe copyright, trademark and other laws or applicable intellectual property or other rights.
common.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_TEXT_2: All copyright, trademark and similar notices are preserved.
common.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_TEXT_3: The Content does not use or imply that M1group provides certification or endorsement of an organization or its products or services.
common.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_TEXT_4: The material on the Site may be modified or  terminated the site without notice or liability,and may not be used for any public or commercial purposes without the express written permission of the appropriate content or material provider. M1Group assumes no risk, responsibility or liability in the event that User does not obtain this express written permission as advised by M1Group.
